column3: Traffic;Kampot Province: There was a traffic accident after a truck operated by Chip Mong Land Company had a breaks failure. The truck hit a car
column5: causing an old lady to die at the scene.------The accident happened on the morning of September 9
column9: Kampot province.------Residents claim that the accident caused damage to four cars
column12: a house and the death of the woman.------However
column13: now the authorities are at the scene to solve this problem. ------NKD
